mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tk (memID, subject, date, time, theater, seat, casting, price, review) VALUES(#{memID}, #{subject} , #{date}, #{time}, #{theater}, #{seat}, #{casting}, #{price}, #{review})
mapper.update: UPDATE tk SET memID = #{memID}, subject = #{subject}, date = #{date}, time = #{time}, theater = #{theater} , seat = #{seat}, casting = #{casting}, price = #{price}, review = #{review} WHERE no=#{no}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM theater WHERE no = #{no} or memID = #{memID}, subject = #{subject}, date = #{date}, time = #{time}, theater = #{theater} , seat = #{seat}, casting = #{casting}, price = #{price}, review = #{review}
